00070     class Exception : public std::exception
00071     {
00072     public:
00076         Exception( const std::string& details );
00077         ~Exception() throw();
00078 
00080         const char* what() const throw();
00081 
00082         std::string m_details; 
00083     };
00084 
00089     #define TICPPTHROW( message )                                           \
00090     {                                                                       \
00091         std::ostringstream full_message;                                    \
00092         std::string file( __FILE__ );                                       \
00093         file = file.substr( file.find_last_of( "\\/" ) + 1 );               \
00094         full_message << message << " <" << file << "@" << __LINE__ << ">";  \
00095         full_message << BuildDetailedErrorString();                         \
00096         throw Exception( full_message.str() );                              \
00097     }
00098

00109     class Visitor : public TiXmlVisitor
00110     {
00111     public:
00112         // Overload the TiXmlVisitor functions, wrap objects, call ticpp::Visitor functions
00114         virtual bool VisitEnter( const TiXmlDocument& doc );
00116         virtual bool VisitExit( const TiXmlDocument& doc );
00118         virtual bool VisitEnter( const TiXmlElement& element, const TiXmlAttribute* firstAttribute );
00120         virtual bool VisitExit( const TiXmlElement& element );
00122         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlDeclaration& declaration );
00124         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlStylesheetReference& stylesheet );
00126         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlText& text );
00128         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlComment& comment );
00129 
00130     public:
00132         virtual bool VisitEnter( const Document& /*doc*/ )          { return true; }
00134         virtual bool VisitExit( const Document& /*doc*/ )           { return true; }
00135 
00137         virtual bool VisitEnter( const Element& /*element*/, const Attribute* /*firstAttribute*/ )  { return true; }
00139         virtual bool VisitExit( const Element& /*element*/ )        { return true; }
00140 
00142         virtual bool Visit( const Declaration& /*declaration*/ )    { return true; }
00144         virtual bool Visit( const StylesheetReference& /*stylesheet*/ ) { return true; }
00146         virtual bool Visit( const Text& /*text*/ )                  { return true; }
00148         virtual bool Visit( const Comment& /*comment*/ )            { return true; }
00149     };

00152     class Base
00153     {
00154     public:
00155 
00161         template < class T >
00162             std::string ToString( const T& value ) const
00163         {
00164             std::stringstream convert;
00165             convert << value;
00166             if ( convert.fail() )
00167             {
00168                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert value to text" );
00169             }
00170             return convert.str();
00171         }
00172 
00173         std::string ToString( const std::string& value ) const
00174         {
00175             return value;
00176         }
00177 
00184         template < class T >
00185             void FromString( const std::string& temp, T* out ) const
00186         {
00187             std::istringstream val( temp );
00188             val >> *out;
00189 
00190             if ( val.fail() )
00191             {
00192                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert \"" << temp << "\" to target type" );
00193             }
00194         }
00195 
00199         void FromString( const std::string& temp, std::string* out ) const
00200         {
00201             *out = temp;
00202         }
00203 
00208         int Row() const
00209         {
00210             return GetBasePointer()->Row();
00211         }
00212 
00217         int Column() const
00218         {
00219             return GetBasePointer()->Column();
00220         }
00221 
00225         bool operator == ( const Base& rhs ) const
00226         {
00227             return ( GetBasePointer() == rhs.GetBasePointer() );
00228         }
00229 
00233         bool operator != ( const Base& rhs ) const
00234         {
00235             return ( GetBasePointer() != rhs.GetBasePointer() );
00236         }
00237 
00241         std::string BuildDetailedErrorString() const
00242         {
00243             std::ostringstream full_message;
00244             #ifndef TICPP_NO_RTTI
00245             TiXmlNode* node = dynamic_cast< TiXmlNode* >( GetBasePointer() );
00246             if ( node != 0 )
00247             {
00248                 TiXmlDocument* doc = node->GetDocument();
00249                 if ( doc != 0 )
00250                 {
00251                     if ( doc->Error() )
00252                     {
00253                         full_message    << "\nDescription: " << doc->ErrorDesc()
00254                                         << "\nFile: " << (strlen( doc->Value() ) > 0 ? doc->Value() : "<unnamed-file>")
00255                                         << "\nLine: " << doc->ErrorRow()
00256                                         << "\nColumn: " << doc->ErrorCol();
00257                     }
00258                 }
00259             }
00260             #endif
00261             return full_message.str();
00262         }
00263 
00267         virtual ~Base()
00268         {
00269         }
00270 
00271     protected:
00272         mutable TiCppRCImp* m_impRC;    
00280         void SetImpRC( TiXmlBase* node )
00281         {
00282             m_impRC = node->m_tiRC;
00283         }
00284 
00285         void ValidatePointer() const
00286         {
00287             if ( m_impRC->IsNull() )
00288             {
00289                 TICPPTHROW( "Internal TiXml Pointer is NULL" );
00290             }
00291         }
00292 
00297         virtual TiXmlBase* GetBasePointer() const = 0;
00298     };

00748 
00756         template < class T >
00757             void IterateFirst( const std::string& value, T** first ) const
00758         {
00759             *first = 0;
00760             for( Node* child = FirstChild( value, false ); child; child = child->NextSibling( value, false ) )
00761             {
00762                 *first = dynamic_cast< T* >( child );
00763                 if ( 0 != *first )
00764                 {
00765                     return;
00766                 }
00767             }
00768         }
00769 
00770         virtual void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** ) const
00771         {
00772             TICPPTHROW( "Attributes can only be iterated with Elements." )
00773         }
00774 
00782         template < class T >
00783             void IterateNext( const std::string& value, T** next ) const
00784         {
00785             Node* sibling = NextSibling( value, false );
00786             *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00787 
00788             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *next ) )
00789             {
00790                 sibling = sibling->NextSibling( value, false );
00791                 *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00792             }
00793         }
00794 
00802         template < class T >
00803             void IteratePrevious( const std::string& value, T** previous  ) const
00804         {
00805             Node* sibling = PreviousSibling( value, false );
00806             *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00807 
00808             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *previous ) )
00809             {
00810                 sibling = sibling->PreviousSibling( value, false );
00811                 *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00812             }
00813         }
00814 
00823         Element* NextSiblingElement( bool throwIfNoSiblings = true ) const;

00902         #ifndef TICPP_NO_RTTI
00903 
00909         template < class T >
00910             T* To() const
00911         {
00912             T* pointer = dynamic_cast< T* >( this );
00913             if ( 0 == pointer )
00914             {
00915                 std::string thisType = typeid( this ).name();
00916                 std::string targetType = typeid( T ).name();
00917                 std::string thatType = typeid( *this ).name();
00918                 TICPPTHROW( "The " << thisType.substr( 6 ) << " could not be casted to a " << targetType.substr( 6 )
00919                     << " *, because the target object is not a " << targetType.substr( 6 ) << ". (It is a " << thatType.substr( 6 ) << ")" );
00920             }
00921             return pointer;
00922         }
00923         #endif
00924 
00930         Document* ToDocument() const;
00931 
00937         Element* ToElement() const;

00945

00995         friend std::istream& operator >>( std::istream& in, Node& base )
00996         {
00997             in >> *base.GetTiXmlPointer();
00998             return in;
00999         }
01000 
01004         friend std::ostream& operator <<( std::ostream& out, const Node& base )
01005         {
01006             out << *base.GetTiXmlPointer();
01007             return out;
01008         }
01009 
01010     protected:

01056     template < class T = Node >
01057         class Iterator
01058     {
01059     private:
01060         T* m_p;                 
01061         std::string m_value;    
01063     public:
01064 
01074         T* begin( const Node* parent ) const
01075         {
01076             T* pointer;
01077             parent->IterateFirst( m_value, &pointer );
01078             return pointer;
01079         }
01080 
01089         T* end() const
01090         {
01091             return 0;
01092         }
01093 
01102         Iterator( const std::string& value = "" )
01103             : m_p( 0 ), m_value( value )
01104         {
01105         }
01106 
01108         Iterator( T* node, const std::string& value = "" )
01109             : m_p( node ), m_value( value )
01110         {
01111         }
01112 
01114         Iterator( const Iterator& it )
01115             : m_p( it.m_p ), m_value( it.m_value )
01116         {
01117         }
01118 
01123         T* Get() const
01124         {
01125             return m_p;
01126         }
01127 
01129         Iterator& operator=( const Iterator& it )
01130         {
01131             m_p = it.m_p;
01132             m_value = it.m_value;
01133             return *this;
01134         }
01135 
01137         Iterator& operator=( T* p )
01138         {
01139             m_p = p;
01140             return *this;
01141         }
01142 
01144         Iterator& operator++()
01145         {
01146             m_p->IterateNext( m_value, &m_p );
01147             return *this;
01148         }
01149 
01151         Iterator operator++(int)
01152         {
01153             Iterator tmp(*this);
01154             ++(*this);
01155             return tmp;
01156         }
01157 
01159         Iterator& operator--()
01160         {
01161             m_p->IteratePrevious( m_value, &m_p );
01162             return *this;
01163         }
01164 
01166         Iterator operator--(int)
01167         {
01168             Iterator tmp(*this);
01169             --(*this);
01170             return tmp;
01171         }
01172 
01174         bool operator!=( const T* p ) const
01175         {
01176             if ( m_p == p )
01177             {
01178                 return false;
01179             }
01180             if ( 0 == m_p || 0 == p )
01181             {
01182                 return true;
01183             }
01184             return *m_p != *p;
01185         }
01186 
01188         bool operator!=( const Iterator& it ) const
01189         {
01190             return operator!=( it.m_p );
01191         }
01192 
01194         bool operator==( T* p ) const
01195         {
01196             if ( m_p == p )
01197             {
01198                 return true;
01199             }
01200             if ( 0 == m_p || 0 == p )
01201             {
01202                 return false;
01203             }
01204             return *m_p == *p;
01205         }
01206 
01208         bool operator==( const Iterator& it ) const
01209         {
01210             return operator==( it.m_p );
01211         }
01212 
01214         T* operator->() const
01215         {
01216             return m_p;
01217         }
01218 
01220         T& operator*() const
01221         {
01222             return *m_p;
01223         }
01224     };
01225 
01227     template < class T >
01228         class NodeImp : public Node
01229     {
01230     protected:
01231 
01232         T* m_tiXmlPointer;      
01240         TiXmlNode* GetTiXmlPointer() const
01241         {
01242             ValidatePointer();
01243             return m_tiXmlPointer;
01244         }
01245 
01253         void SetTiXmlPointer( T* newPointer )
01254         {
01255             m_tiXmlPointer = newPointer;
01256             SetImpRC( newPointer );
01257         }
01258 
01263         NodeImp( T* tiXmlPointer )
01264         {
01265             // Check for NULL pointers
01266             if ( 0 == tiXmlPointer )
01267             {
01268                 #ifdef TICPP_NO_RTTI
01269                     TICPPTHROW( "Can not create TinyXML objext" );
01270                 #else
01271                     TICPPTHROW( "Can not create a " << typeid( T ).name() );
01272                 #endif
01273             }
01274             SetTiXmlPointer( tiXmlPointer );
01275             m_impRC->IncRef();
01276         }
01277 
01283         virtual void operator=( const NodeImp<T>& copy )
01284         {
01285             // Dropping the reference to the old object
01286             this->m_impRC->DecRef();
01287 
01288             // Pointing to the new Object
01289             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01290 
01291             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01292             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01293         }
01294 
01300         NodeImp( const NodeImp<T>& copy ) : Node( copy )
01301         {
01302             // Pointing to the new Object
01303             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01304 
01305             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01306             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01307         }
01308 
01309     public:
01310 
01311         /*
01312         Deletes the spawned wrapper objects.
01313         Decrements reference count.
01314         */
01315         virtual ~NodeImp()
01316         {
01317             m_impRC->DecRef();
01318         }
01319     };

01522         void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** first ) const
01523         {
01524             *first = 0;
01525             for( Attribute* child = FirstAttribute( false ); child; child = child->Next( false ) )
01526             {
01527                 *first = dynamic_cast< Attribute* >( child );
01528                 if ( 0 != *first )
01529                 {
01530                     return;
01531                 }
01532             }
01533         }
01534 
01542         template < class T >
01543             void SetAttribute ( const std::string& name, const T& value )
01544         {
01545             ValidatePointer();
01546             m_tiXmlPointer->SetAttribute( name, ToString( value ) );
01547         }
01548 
01561         std::string GetText( bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01562         {
01563             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01564             std::string temp;
01565             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01566             {
01567                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01568                 {
01569                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01570                 }
01571             }
01572 
01573             return temp;
01574         }
01575 
01587         std::string GetTextOrDefault( const std::string& defaultValue ) const
01588         {
01589             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01590             std::string temp;
01591             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01592             {
01593                 return defaultValue;
01594             }
01595 
01596             return temp;
01597         }
01598 
01613         template < class T, class DefaultT >
01614             void GetTextOrDefault( T* value, const DefaultT& defaultValue ) const
01615         {
01616             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01617             std::string temp;
01618             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01619             {
01620                 // The text value does not exist - set value to the default
01621                 *value = defaultValue;
01622                 return;
01623             }
01624 
01625             // Stream the value from the string to T
01626             FromString( temp, value );
01627         }
01628 
01644         template< class T >
01645             void GetText( T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01646         {
01647             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01648             std::string temp;
01649             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01650             {
01651                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01652                 {
01653                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01654                 }
01655                 else
01656                 {
01657                     return;
01658                 }
01659             }
01660 
01661             // Stream the value from the string to T
01662             FromString( temp, value );
01663         }
01664 
01672         template < class T >
01673             void SetText( const T& value )
01674         {
01675             ValidatePointer();
01676             std::string temp = ToString( value );
01677 
01678             if ( m_tiXmlPointer->NoChildren() )
01679             {
01680                 m_tiXmlPointer->LinkEndChild( new TiXmlText( temp ) );
01681             }
01682             else
01683             {
01684                 if ( 0 == m_tiXmlPointer->GetText() )
01685                 {
01686                     m_tiXmlPointer->InsertBeforeChild( m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild(), TiXmlText( temp ) );
01687                 }
01688                 else
01689                 {
01690                     // There already is text, so change it
01691                     m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild()->SetValue( temp );
01692                 }
01693             }
01694         }
01695 
01707         template < class T, class DefaulT >
01708             void GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, T* value, const DefaulT& defaultValue ) const
01709         {
01710             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01711             std::string temp;
01712             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01713             {
01714                 // The attribute does not exist - set value to the default
01715                 *value = defaultValue;
01716                 return;
01717             }
01718 
01719             // Stream the value from the string to T
01720             FromString( temp, value );
01721         }
01722 
01731         std::string GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, const std::string& defaultValue ) const;
01732 
01742         template < class T >
01743             T GetAttribute( const std::string& name, bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01744         {
01745             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01746             std::string temp;
01747             T value;
01748             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01749             {
01750                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01751                 {
01752                     const std::string error( std::string( "Attribute '" ) + name + std::string( "' does not exist" ) );
01753                     TICPPTHROW( error );
01754                 }
01755             }
01756             else
01757             {
01758                 // Stream the value from the string to T
01759                 FromString( temp, &value );
01760             }
01761 
01762             return value;
01763         }
01764 
01776         template< class T >
01777             void GetAttribute( const std::string& name, T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01778         {
01779             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01780             std::string temp;
01781             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01782             {
01783                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01784                 {
01785                     const std::string error( std::string( "Attribute '" ) + name + std::string( "' does not exist" ) );
01786                     TICPPTHROW( error );
01787                 }
01788                 else
01789                 {
01790                     return;
01791                 }
01792             }
01793 
01794             // Stream the value from the string to T
01795             FromString( temp, value );
01796         }
01797 
01807         std::string GetAttribute( const std::string& name ) const;
01808 
01815         bool HasAttribute( const std::string& name ) const;
01816 
01822         void RemoveAttribute( const std::string& name );
01823 
01824     private:
01825 
01830         bool GetAttributeImp( const std::string& name, std::string* value ) const;
01831 
01836         bool GetTextImp( std::string* value ) const;
01837     };
